Eliminate the hassle of repetitive clicking and scrolling, making your navigation more efficient. Save time and focus on what matters by instantly accessing buttons you frequently use.

Key Features:

- Effortless Button Saving: Right-click any element on any webpage and select “Save this button for clicking.” This feature allows you to remember important buttons for easy access later, reducing the need to scroll back down.

- Instant Action with a Click: Clicking the extension's badge in the toolbar will perform the action of your saved button, whether it’s “Next,” “Submit,” or any other element. Enjoy seamless navigation across all your favorite sites!

- Smart Page Reload Handling: Bottom Button Clicker intelligently identifies your saved element on reloaded pages, ensuring your saved buttons remain functional. Perfect for navigating through pagination or multi-step forms!

- No More Scrolling Woes: Keep your focus at the top of the page without the frustration of searching for buttons at the bottom. Save your button once and access it anytime with just a click!

Proactive Alerts: If the saved element cannot be found, the extension will notify you immediately, keeping you informed and allowing for quick adjustments.

Intelligent Suggestions: When button identification is unclear, Bottom Button Clicker will highlight possible candidates and notify you, ensuring you don’t miss the right element.

Important Note:
Currently, Bottom Button Clicker supports only one saved element at a time. This means you can save and access one button easily; however, future updates may allow for multiple saved buttons.

Reminder:
To make the most of Bottom Button Clicker, don’t forget to pin the extension to your Chrome toolbar for easy access!

Use Cases:
Imagine effortlessly completing lengthy online forms, where you've saved the submit button for quick access. Or think of browsing an e-commerce site, where you can seamlessly navigate product pages by saving the "Next" button. With Bottom Button Clicker, your browsing experience is transformed!
